name: Coffee Debates
description:
Stir up the festive cheer with your favourite folks. For hearty conversations, treat your friends and family to a taste of premium single-origin, 100% Arabica.

Our Coffee Debates Gift Box comes with two coffee variants, Signature and Grand Reserve. The two bold and distinct flavoured coffees, alongside a set of beautiful green latte mugs are a perfect combination.

Please add the preferred grind size in the order note at cart page.Â
